artifacts.summary: Comprehensive research on imp and box cases with proof strategies, found existing MCS modus ponens lemma, identified box case requires semantic changes or witness construction

next_steps: Run /plan 656 to create implementation plan after user decides on approach (mutual induction vs. forward-only, and box case semantics)

key_findings: MCS modus ponens closure lemma (set_mcs_implication_property) already exists in Boneyard
Imp case requires backward direction IH (circular dependency - needs mutual induction)
Box case requires universal quantification over all histories, not just canonical ones
Standard approach uses mutual induction proving forward/backward simultaneously
recommendations: Recommendation 1 (Preferred): Use mutual induction for full biconditional truth lemma
Recommendation 2 (Alternative): Complete forward-only with explicit restrictions
Recommendation 3 (Minimal): Defer box case, complete imp case only
critical_dependencies: User decision on mutual induction vs. forward-only approach
User decision on box case semantics (modal accessibility, canonical histories restriction, or axiomatization)
